dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
Léon Bottou
Yoshua Bengio
Patrick Haffner
dcterms:description: A dataset for handwritten digits recognition that is widely used for validating image recognition models. It contains 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images with the size of 28 × 28.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Pierre Sermanet
Soumith Chintala
Yann LeCun
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of images of house numbers, used for digit classification. It contains over 600,000 labeled digits from real-world images.
dcterms:title: SVHN

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of tiny colored natural images with the size of 32 × 32 from 10 categories, used for training machine learning models.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of tiny colored natural images with the size of 32 × 32 from 100 categories, used for training machine learning models.
dcterms:title: CIFAR100
